attributes.action: Stop funding Cuts for all college and universities
attributes.additional_details: We want all Students to enjoy learning there subject at college and University because education is important for people aged between 16-19 so they can have the best future and career they, students need to choose the right career for themselves because at the moment all students finishing college and going to university their parents have to choose the career for them because the prices are way to expensive now with the 30% Funding cut. This needs to stop so all students and staff can enjoy learning and teaching at college and universities. On Wednesday 17th October Jeremy Corbyn said these exact quotes written below. "We stand today for properly funded colleges and properly paid staff." "We stand today for the principles of education for all as a right."
attributes.background: We would like action on stopping funding cuts for College and university Students and staff because all of the staff that are teaching FE courses are getting less money from when the plan of the funding cuts . Please sign this Petition is you want the funding cuts stopped.
